company_info.Company Description: We would like to introduce ourselves one of the leading IATA approved travel agent in Kolkata [India][IATA NO 1430725-2]We are dealing with domestic and International Holiday Packages / domestic and International hotel bookings /Group booking /FIT /MICE, Foreign Exchange, Travel Insurance and International calling card, ETC.We have authorized agent inIATA & AUSSIE SPECIALISTand Member inTAFI, TAAI, IAAI, SKAL, UFTAA, OTOAIand we are also certified fromINCREDIBLE INDIA.[Recognised Travel Agent By Ministry Of Tourism, Govt. Of India]
